EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you: Building Big Data Applications with Hadoop & Spring Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Building Big Data Applications with Hadoop & Spring We're glad you were able to join us. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Thank you for joining us for our third installment in the "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series. We explored how Spring XD (Xtreme Data) is addressing Big Data Application needs such as:
- High throughput distributed data ingestion into HDFS from a variety of input sources. - Real-time analytics at ingestion time, e.g. gathering metrics and counting values. - Hadoop workflow management via batch jobs. - High throughput data export, e.g. from HDFS to a RDBMS or NoSQL database.
An on demand broadcast (replay) is available on our website <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/Building-Big-Data-Applications-with-Hadoop-Spring-WEB.m4v>.
If you haven't already, we'd like you to take the opportunity to download Pivotal HD Single Node (VM) <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-hd#4> and Pivotal HD Community <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-hd#4>. With your Pivotal HD Community deployment, we would like to invite you to download HAWQ - the native, mature and fast SQL query engine for Hadoop, which is now freely available for download <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-hd#4> for a 60-day free trial.
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:info@gopivotal.com>.
